title: ArcheAge
notes: Glyph launcher opens but clicking "Play Game" does nothing

cpu: AMD A8-7600 Radeon R7, 10 Compute Cores 4C+6G
notes:
No messing with anything under the hood; just tried through Steam interface and with user_settings.py tweaks as above. 
Glyph launcher starts and sits there. Pressing the play button does nothing. There is a wineserver running and some other wine processes but no game appears and nothing in the process list looks like it might be ArcheAge.
title: ArcheAge
